net.cnri.repository.bdbje

Class BdbjeRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.AbstractRepository
      • net.cnri.repository.bdbje.BdbjeRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectRepository, Repository

    public class BdbjeRepository
extends AbstractRepository
implements DirectRepository
    Digital Object repository built using a Berkeley DB JE environment.

                                  throws CreationException,
                                         RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Creates a new digital object with the given identifier in this repository. Passing null requests that the repository assign a new unique identifier; this method will throw UnsupportedOperationException if the given repository does not support that functionality.
        Specified by:
        createDigitalObject in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        handle - the identifier for the new digital object, or null to request that the repository assign a new unique identifier.
        Returns:
        the newly-created digital object
        Throws:

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String handle,
                            java.lang.String elementName)
                     throws RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: DirectRepository
        Returns a file for the data of the data element. Reading or writing the file corresponds to reading and writing the data element. If the repository does not support files for data elements, returns null.
        Specified by:
        getFile in interface DirectRepository
        Returns:
        A file for the data of the data element, or null if the repository does not support files for data elements.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException
